entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bachelors Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
